ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISCHANGED(Type),ISCHANGED(Case_Record_Type__c)), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Type), 'WEB Portal Registration'), PRIORVALUE(Case_Record_Type__c)='WEB Portal Registration', $Profile.Name !='System Administrator', $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator', $Profile.Name !='Master Data Administrator', $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change Case Record Type and Type of the Web Portal Registration case.
